Content: I need to get something I wrote on my phone to my computer

(SCP-2 and 3 are referring to the Virtual Boy headset and the Video Game themselves_ the number may be different)NLNLFor SCP Virtual Boy_ put in “Containment Procedures_ “Foundation bots are to be manned at all times to search the internet for cases of missing people who’re especially involved in video games_ virtual reality technology_ old video game consoles_ etc. Cases of notability will be logged by the bots_ and if in 8-11 months_ an infant of the recorded person’s exact name_ eye color_ hair color_ nationality_ and race appears_ Foundation personnel will be contacted to investigate. Additional SCP-2 and -3 instances found will be contained in the same manner as the existing SCP-2 and -3 instances”. NLNLAnd_ “If at any moment another pair of similarly anomalous SCP-2 and -3 are found_ anyone who observed it’s affects_ or have been acquainted with the victim must be given Class B amnestics. The parents of the victim Class C amnestics. All traces of the victim’s existence in the local town must be wiped_ including year books_ photographs_ or newspaper headlines. With more modern cases_ social media must also be checked and wiped similarly.” NLNLNLIn description:NLAlso include somewhere_ “It is currently unknown whether found instances of SCP-2 and -3 were always analmolous_ or became anomalous_ and it is unknown wether newer Virtual Reality headsets could become anomalous.”
